articles.title: Nikola Vucevic, Celtics roll into All-Star break with blowout win over Bulls: 7 takeaways
articles.description:
Vucevic came off the bench again, tallying 19 points, 11 rebounds, three assists, two blocks and a steal.

The post Nikola Vucevic, Celtics roll into All-Star break with blowout win over Bulls: 7 takeaways appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Celtics secured a decisive win over the Bulls before the All-Star break.
Nikola Vucevic contributed 19 points and 11 rebounds off the bench.
Boston heads into the break with momentum, boosting playoff aspirations.

articles.title: ‘Modern day concentration camp’: Irish man living in Boston area has been in ICE detention for 5 months
articles.description:
“We tried to do everything the right way that you're supposed to do, so I'm just begging, just let us at least finish that," his wife, Tiffany Smith, said.

The post ‘Modern day concentration camp’: Irish man living in Boston area has been in ICE detention for 5 months appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Irish man in Boston area has been detained by ICE for 5 months.
Tiffany Smith, his wife, pleads for a resolution to their immigration process.
Detention raises concerns about immigrant rights and local community support.

articles.title: Will Patriots move on from Stefon Diggs? Maye says WR has a lot ‘left in the tank’
articles.description:
“I know there’s some left, and I’m looking forward to getting a chance to hopefully throw him some more passes and watch [No.] 8 go.”

The post Will Patriots move on from Stefon Diggs? Maye says WR has a lot ‘left in the tank’ appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Drake Maye expresses confidence in Stefon Diggs' abilities for the Patriots.
Maye anticipates throwing more passes to Diggs, who wears jersey No. 8.
Potential retention of Diggs could enhance Patriots' offensive performance in upcoming seasons.

articles.title: Watch: Maynard police, fire crews save dog from ‘pet owner’s worst nightmare’
articles.description:
Emergency crews leaped into action when they got a call that a dog had fallen through a hole in the ice of a Maynard pond.

The post Watch: Maynard police, fire crews save dog from ‘pet owner’s worst nightmare’ appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Maynard emergency crews rescued a dog from a pond on February 11.
Police and fire teams responded quickly to the ice incident.
The rescue highlights the importance of safety for pet owners in winter.
